oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry performer interviews with Connie B. Gay
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Connie B. Gay talks with Opry performers Minnie Pearl, Culley Holt of the Jordanaires, Rod Brasfield, and Red Foley on December 31, 1950 ahead of that evening's performance at the National Guard Armory, Washington, DC.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Donald Tucker) -- Connie B. Gay introduces Minnie Pearl -- Connie B. Gay and Minnie Pearl talk -- Minnie Pearl talks introduces Culley Holt -- Connie B. Gay and Culley Holt talk -- Connie B. Gay introduces Rod Brasfield -- Connie B. Gay and Rod Brasfield talk -- Connie B. Gay introduces Red Foley -- Connie B. Gay and Red Foley talk -- Connie B. Gay introduces Donald Tucker -- Payroll Savings Plan commercial
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Gay, Connie B. (Connie Barriot), 1914-1989; Minnie Pearl; Holt, Culley; Brasfield, Rod; Foley, Red, 1910-1968
